Title:
A revision of Microloma R. Br.
(Asclepiadaceae-Asclepiadeae).
Journal:
Botanische Jahrbücher für Systematik, Pflanzengeschichte
und Pflanzengeographie
Abstract:
The genus Microloma is revised. 10 species are recognised:
M. poicilanthum, M. armatum, M. Iongitubum, M. hereroense, M. calycinum,
M. sagittatum, M. incanum, M. penicillatum, M. tenuifolium, M.
namaquense. The genus is divided into 4 sections two of which are
described as new. Each species is illustrated in detail, material
examined is cited and full synonymy given. A cladistic analysis is
carried out.
